title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 5002.7 - Payment for previous service for members with a date of membership on or after January 1, 2010, who are eligible to purchase such service
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 5002.7 - Payment for previous service for members with a date of membership on or after January 1, 2010, who are eligible to purchase such service

State Regulations

The amount of money to be paid for previous service which
predates the member's date of membership in the case of members with a date of
membership on or after January 1, 2010 (Tier V) shall be 3.5 percent of wages
earned together with interest at the rate of five percent per annum compounded
annually from the date of such service until the date of
payment. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
5002.7

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
